data.description:
Explore the natural world in a whole new way with WildXR, the immersive virtual reality app that brings the planet's most thrilling wildlife experiences to your fingertips. Dive into an unparalleled adventure where you are in control, witnessing wildlife encounters at your own pace, from wherever you are.

WildXR is more than just an app - it’s a gateway into the heart of the world’s most diverse ecosystems. Get splashed by elephants as they wallow in African water holes. Marvel at the captivating dance of birds of paradise in the jungles of Southeast Asia. Watch in awe as spider monkeys swing through the jungle with ease, or witness endangered green sea turtles visiting “cleaning stations” in the deep oceans. These and many other experiences await you.

In addition, WildXR now offers a library of short films and documentaries, including wildlife adventures following world-renowned veterinary teams and conservation stories.

WildXR consistently releases fresh virtual reality experiences and educational content, providing an ever-changing and captivating gateway to the wonders of the natural world. 

In this latest update, we’ve streamlined the user interface and enhanced the ability to watch and enjoy the experiences in non-internet-connected environments.

changelog.change_log:
WildXR 1.4 Release Notes
We're excited to announce the release of WildXR 1.4, featuring a significant upgrade to our video streaming service. This update will allow us to provide higher-resolution videos in the future, allowing for an even more immersive wildlife experience. To ensure the best possible performance, we recommend downloading videos rather than streaming them, as this will provide a smoother viewing experience regardless of internet speeds or connectivity issues.

To take full advantage of these improvements, we suggest uninstalling your current WildXR application (version 1.3) and performing a clean installation of version 1.4. This process will ensure you have the most stable and feature-rich version of WildXR.

Preserving Your Downloaded Videos
If you have previously downloaded videos and wish to keep them:
Before uninstalling, move the "downloads" folder from "C:\Users[YourUserNameHere]\AppData\LocalLow\Wildlife Protection Solutions\WildXR" to your desktop.
Uninstall WildXR 1.3, return to the "C:\Users[YourUserNameHere]\AppData\LocalLow\Wildlife Protection Solutions" folder and delete the WildXR folder.
Install version 1.4 and then return the "downloads" folder to its original location.
Fix a bug causing problems when launching the app while not connected to the internet

WildXR 1.4.0 Release Notes
We're excited to announce the release of WildXR 1.4.0, featuring a significant upgrade to our video streaming service. This update will allow us to provide higher-resolution videos in the future, allowing for an even more immersive wildlife experience. To ensure the best possible performance, we recommend downloading videos rather than streaming them, as this will provide a smoother viewing experience regardless of internet speeds or connectivity issues.
To take full advantage of these improvements, we suggest uninstalling your current WildXR application (version 1.3.1) and performing a clean installation of version 1.4.0. This process will ensure you have the most stable and feature-rich version of WildXR.
Preserving Your Downloaded Videos
If you have previously downloaded videos and wish to keep them:
Before uninstalling, move the "downloads" folder from "C:\Users[YourUserNameHere]\AppData\LocalLow\Wildlife Protection Solutions\WildXR" to your desktop.
Uninstall WildXR 1.3.1, install version 1.4.0, and then move the "downloads" folder back to its original location.
This will allow you to retain all your favorite wildlife content while enjoying the benefits of the latest version.

Fixed application status being improperly handled as offline
Improved initial load time
Improved cache performance
Overall stability enhancements
